metadata.description: The Raccoon's in charge! Peter Quill has abandoned the Guardians and his role as Star-Lord to be Emperor of the Spartax. Rocket didn't wait a single minute to take the reins and become team leader of Drax, Venom, Groot, Kitty Pryde (A.K.A. Star-Lady?), and new Guardian Ben Grimm, the everloving Thing!
metadata.name: Guardians of the Galaxy
